review: Excellent product. It picked up my wireless with no problem. Stronger signal than my smart TV. Remote works great even from a distance. Very pleased and would highly recommend.
author: Richard Bosacki

review: Just as expected. As good as the regular Fire TV only with less features.
author: Charles G.

review: I am more than satisfied with the firestick
author: Scott Meader

review: My older TV is now a Smart TV!  I actually like this better than my Samsung Smart TV.  Quicker load, better arrangement.
author: Shelly Velasco

review: I'm still getting used to them, I ordered two. There is so many choices that it takes me awhile to decide What I feel like watching, a movie, historical program, TV series, its possibilities are immence.....
author: Donna

review: It is super easy to use. Love it.
author: John T. Patochek

review: Very easy to set up.  Easy to use.  Great access and resolution.
author: Pellinore "Pellinore"

review: Fire stick exceeded my expectations - I plan on taking it on a trip soon and am sure it will work great.
author: Robert (Bob) Capp

review: I love the fire stick!! It's totally amazing and has exceeded all of my expectations. I like how the stick categories from the apps to music to movies etc. It's so fun to play with.
author: Lisa Hansel
